title: Calculating Risk Scores for Insurance Policies (RISKPROG) - Overview
---
# Overview

This document explains the flow for processing policy records. Each record is validated, scored for risk, and classified as LOW, MEDIUM, or HIGH risk, with results written to an output file.

## Dependencies

### Program

- RISKPROG (<SwmPath>[base/src/lgarsk01.cbl](base/src/lgarsk01.cbl)</SwmPath>)
